h2_title: How to Find Gold Armored Rhino
h3_title: Gold Armored Rhino Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once its horn is broken, it’ll try to get away from you. Use Immobilize if needed to keep the Rhino in place, then quickly use Wandering Wight to smash the horn. Follow this up with Pluck of Many and the Plantain Fan to knock the Rhino over repeatedly and overwhelm it with your duplicates.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Armored_Rhino.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Armored Rhino', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Gold Armored Rhino' and the sub-subsection 'Gold Armored Rhino Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once its horn is broken, it’ll try to get away from you. Use Immobilize if needed to keep the Rhino in place, then quickly use Wandering Wight to smash the horn. Follow this up with Pluck of Many and the Plantain Fan to knock the Rhino over repeatedly and overwhelm it with your duplicates.
